skillTree.localised_description: The larger wolves are bred by the Hobgoblins to pull their ramshackle chariots, and be mounts for their cruel Bosses and nasty Shamans.

ui_effects.localised_text: Grants one of the listed effects at random

enabled_if: Friendly units with Contempt in range

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Gorduz has caught someone trying to cheat him and goes into a fit of rage. Run, if you know what's good for you – as far and as fast as possible!

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: The Father of Darkness protects his children from sorcery through a variety of magical means, all of them twisted and obscure.
Having a thing for hats can be most useful when everyone keeps aiming at your head…
Something is keeping Gorduz alive when he really should be dead in a ditch somewhere …or at least that's how it appears to literally *everyone* else.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: To say Gorduz has been a lucky git would be something of an understatement.
Like all Hobgoblins, only better, Gorduz is above all else, a cunning little git with lashings of low cunning and a beguiling level of stealth at his disposal.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Gorduz, Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Attribute: Stalk for Gorduz, Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: By virtue of his considerable experience, Gorduz is the stabbiest of all da stabberz. No question.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Hobgoblin units
	(all units in army)

Unit experience gain: +100% for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Stick 'em wiv arrers'. Stick 'em with knives, 'an swords, and spears. Stick 'em quick and stick 'em where it 'urts. But most of all, stick 'em when they's looking the other way."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +6 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +8 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +16% for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Much has already been said about Gorduz' ability to stay alive, but let's not forget that he is also a formidable shooter, for a Hobgoblin, with a dead-eyed stare.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +25% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +8% for Hobgoblin  and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Ammunition: +33% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +12% for Hobgoblin  and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Ammunition: +50% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +15% for Hobgoblin  and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be a sea of arrows, crackling blasts of magical energy or deadly war machines, being light on his feet has helped keep Gorduz and Da Gitz hold the lines against all comers.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile resistance: +5% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +6 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile resistance: +15% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +9 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile resistance: +25% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: One of the factors in Gorduz' otherwise inexplicable longevity is his sheer, unrelenting aggression in the face of the enemy... or anyone, for that matter.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +15 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +10% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +20% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Charge bonus: +25 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +30% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: "It's clear to me that vis is somefing Da Boyz can't deal wiv on their own – time for Da Gitz!"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Hobgoblin Cutthroats

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 4%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Grants one of the listed effects at random

enabled_if: Friendly units with Contempt in range

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Continually cheating death is an inspiring and not at all frustrating sight for the rabble of Hobgoblins in the Dawi-Zharr's service.

effects.description:
Global recruitment duration: -1 turns for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(factionwide)

Leadership: +6 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(Hero's army)
